alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 9:45AM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .The Green River has crested, and water levels are expected to drop below flood stage at Paradise this afternoon or evening. However, water levels will remain high, and are currently projected to return to minor flooding early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Thursday the stage was 380.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage later today, then rise above flood stage Monday morning and continue rising to 380.6 feet Tuesday morning. Additional rises afterwards are possible. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
